channel.title: Hello plz help mehh
channel.description:
Hi, io was wondering if anyone knew how to chnage things on my server like add Np'cs, be able to talk to Npc's and stuff.
I would ao like to know how do i make myself a Gold Crown...
I would also like to know how to have my statistics maxed out, I've tried on the character file but it doesn't work what do i do after i type in the skills i wanted maxed and the xp?????
thanks

item.title: Hello plz help mehh
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

gold crown… go to ur source and characters and change ur playerRights >= 3

that should be owner(gold crown)

Read full topic

item.title: Hello plz help mehh
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

what source are you using?

chance npcs go to autospawn.cfg and chance NPC ID

get a golden crown get at client.java and search for rights, u will see something like this:

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“HERE A NAME”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“HERE A NAME”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}[/code]

just put at the place where i put the HERE A NAME ur name and chance the playerrights (playerRights = 2;)

player rights 1 is silver crown (player mod)
player rights 2 is golden crown (a mod)
player rights 3 is owner of server (you cant see golden crown but other ppl can see)

Read full topic

@ArmyRanger wrote:
